title: Apsara Engagement Ring: A Modern Twist on Timeless Elegance
materials: White Gold Setting). Features a brilliant-cut diamond (estimated at 0.75 carat
color G-H). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: A captivating split shank design with a central brilliant-cut diamond held in a uniquely crafted white gold setting. The shoulders of the ring feature subtle, intricate hand-engraved detailing. The setting enhances the diamond's brilliance, making it appear larger and more radiant. The split shank creates a modern, open aesthetic.
colors: Two-tone: Yellow Gold and White Gold. The diamond exhibits colorless brilliance.
description: This ring seamlessly blends modern design with the timeless appeal of diamonds. The unique setting and split shank make it a standout piece, perfect for the modern bride-to-be. The high-quality diamond guarantees exceptional sparkle and lasting beauty. Crafted with meticulous detail and Hyderabadi Polish ensures durability and a rich luster that will be cherished for generations.
